1114.content:
Regina sighs as she walks though New York city, everything feels so foreign to her she has no idea how to feel about all of this. People walk by her and into her not caring that she’s there and others not even seeing her. Regina was used to some sort of attention good or bad but not no attention.

Regina had recently been kicked out of Storybrooke due to her actions with the curse, while everyone wanted to kill her for what she had done Emma had convinced them to kick her out of town instead. Luckily for Regina, Mr Gold had suggested that she moved to the city and gave her a place to stay.

That was one week ago and now Regina is bored out of her mind and frustrated as ever. She has no one around her like Henry to love her or someone around her to let things out on. She has never felt more alone in her life.

Regina sighs as she wanders into her apartment, she drops her handbag as she had just gotten back form her boring day job and plonks herself on the couch with a loud sigh. Her apartment was very small, a bedroom, kitchen, lounge and a bathroom. Noting out of the ordinary to a standard apartment. Regina just sits there inn silence like she would do after every day at work just letting everything sink in.

Regina sighs when she hears people yelling down the hallway, this happens every afternoon. A older couple having a screaming match at about the same time every single afternoon. Regina groans as she is sick of it. It’s normally about the same thing, money or how they don’t spend enough time with each other.

“Oh shut up.” Regina groans.

She heads towards the door and pokes her head out trying to see the couple but they have ducked into their apartment. Regina rolls her eyes, she was going to give them a piece of her mind but since they are out of sight there’s no point.

“Afternoon Ms Mills.”

Regina turns to see a women in her late thirties return home form work, she thinks her name is Andrea. She has seen her family around as well, her teenaged son and her older daughter who she doesn’t quite remember the names of.

“Afternoon.” Regina says before heading back inside her place.

Regina sighs and plonks herself back on the couch. She can’t stand this, she needs something to do. Gripping the side of the couch her feels her body fuming as the couple next door continues to scream and argue. She feels her hands tremble before the couch beneath her vanishes. Regina hits the floor with a hard thud. She looks beside her only to find that she had just shrunk the couch. Reginas lip curl, she thought she had all her powers taken but they must have missed some.

“Wonderful.” Regina purrs.

She pulls herself up and heads towards the door wanting to give her new powers a try.


1. Regina heads down the hallway and shrinks the screaming couple next door
2. Regina shrinks Andrea
3. Regina shrinks Andrea and her family
4. Regina's spell backfires and she shrinks herself
5. Regina accidentally grows herself into a giant

Regina purrs as she gets a wonderful idea, while she wanted to toy with the family back in Storybrooke who wronged her she remembers that there is a willing family next toy she can toy with and worship her they way she wants to.

Regina stands up and heads out of her apartment with a large smile, she knocks on the neighbours door and waits for a response.

Regina heads back to her apartment with a wide grin, she is ready for this and is beyond excited. She's known about the size changing spell for a while but she had never gotten around to using it, until now that is.

“Come in.” Regina calls out hearing a knock at the door.

Regina smirks standing to the side a bit getting ready, as soon as the family stepped inside Regina casts her spell blasting them shrinking them almost instantly. Regina laughs as she sees the tiny family squealing at her feet and fives inches tall. She bends down and picks them up with ease. Andrea in one hand, and her two kids in the other. Regina walks over to the table and sets them down.

“What did you do to us Regina!” Andrea squeaks holding her son and daughter close.

“I turned you into frogs, what do you think I did?” Regina grins.

“Please don’t hurt us,” Andrea whimpers.

“Why would I hurt my pets?” Regina purrs running her finger through Andrea’s long blonde hair.

“We're not your pets!” She squeaks.

“It’s either my pets or dog food, it’s up to you.” Regina smiles.

“Fine.” Andrea whimpers.

“Let go of your kids Andrea,” Regina smirks. “You’re crushing the life out of them. What’s your name sweetheart?”

“Sarah.” She says a little nervously, she has long blonde hair like her mother large breasts and a small ass, green eyes. Regina loves the look of her.

“Nice to meet you Sarah,” Regina purrs patting her. “You look older than i expected, I thought you’d be sixteen.”

“My brother is sixteen mam, I’m twenty” Sarah says.

“Such manners.” Regina purrs. “I like you already Sarah, so young and beautiful.”

“Thank you.” Sarah blushes hard and smiles sightly.

Regina smiles as her eyes trailed up and down the tiny woman’s form, she knew that it wouldn’t be hard to break her in. Regina licks her lips thinking about the fun she could have with little Sarah as her large breasts would be wonderful to taste. Regina's eyes then dart over to the other teen with his short blonde hair and green eyes.

“I’m Kyle.” He blushes and couldn’t help but smile at her compliment.

“Such a cute smile.” Regina grins. “I hope you are more than just good looks.”

“Stop flirting with my son you bitch!” Andrea squeaks.

“Excuse me?” Regina turns her attention to Andrea with a raised eye brow, she can tell that Andrea had already regretted what she had said.

“I didn't say anything.” Andrea whimpers backing up slowly. “I’m sorry.”

“As you should be.” Regina smirks. “Listen up my pets, you three belong to me now. You will refer to me as My Queen or Goddess, I’m okay with both. Everything I say goes and if you disobey me you will be punished. Understood?”

“Yes My Queen.” They say in unison.

“Good,” Regina purrs. “Now that we have gotten the introduction out of the way how about we play.”

1151.content:
Henry was a bright and kind little boy, he knew he had a good life because of his mother, as well as while she was a little strict she always loved him and was just a little overprotective of her little prince.

He also knew he was adopted, even back when the version of events was 'When Mommy and Daddy have a special hug', for an oddly simple reason, there was never a daddy, only his mom. There weren't even pictures of her with a man of any kind, with the exception of her father, a man who was small by their standards, coming up only to Regina's shoulder, and a tall bony man Regina explained that while a sly, manipulative bastard he was the closest thing she ever had to a grandfather. So clearly she hadn't been with a man in the correct time frame to have him, and while there were ways around it, Regina never left town, NEVER and there wasn't the necessary equipment in Storybrooke to go the AI way. Leaving adoption as the only other option. Henry didn't feel less loved by this fact, in fact he felt more because it meant Regina chose him to bring into her life, When he finally did speak to him mom about it, Regina held him to her chest and told him what she knew, not the specifics just the important part in her eyes, that his birth mother specifically gave him up so he could have a better life than she could provide, just about able to keep herself going never mind 2 of them at the time.

Still, as the now 10 year old boy leafs through the storybook his teacher gave him (he noticed the characters looked like some of the people in town, but couldn't get the image of his mom, who he could see loved him with all her soul and the Evil Queen to synch up in his head) he wondered about the woman, wanting to meet the woman who made him, and gave him to his mom. Assuming stubbornness was something she passed down to him Henry grins as he begins to plan out his operation, grinning like a madman as he does.

A week later

Emma sighs deeply, looking down at the sad little cupcake in front of her, wishing like every year prior that she didn't have to spend it alone. As she blows out the candle she hears a knock at the door. Pulling herself to her feet Emma opens the door and finds a young boy looking up at her, barely catching 'Well there does my future' mumbled under his breath "What do you want kid?" she asks

"You're Emma Swan right?" Henry asks, already knowing the answer as she was the woman from the photo Regina had

"Yes" Emma replies slowly, feeling very confused

"Great. My name's Henry Mills, I'm your son. You did give a boy up for adoption 10 years ago, right?" Emma's nod was all he got as her brain processes the new information.. that her son was standing in her doorway "Excellent. I've wanted to meet you for a long time, and while Mom may not be happy about this, I decided to come see you"

Emma stops leading the boy to her table and turns "When you say your mom might not be happy..."

"I got a bus here from Maine"

"Without leaving a note or anything?" nod "Fuck, I'm bringing you home, now way am I getting charged with kidnapping an overenthusiastic preteen" Emma mutters, spinning Henry on his heels before locking her apartment and heading downstairs to her Bug, smiling when Henry said the car felt homey, before giving navigational control over to her kid so he could get them to this mysterious 'Storybrooke' she'd never heard off.

By the time they got there it was nightfall and Henry was having her go through desolate wilderness followed by a large field, only the promise that his house was on the other side made her drive through it. Due to the dark Emma couldn't see anything resembling a house, making her worry if not for Henry's content smile, which also told her something was up and he had neglected to tell his other parent what it was also.

"Henry, where the Hell are we?" she finally asks as she pulls to a stop, a little annoyed by his smile

"Home" he grins and pressed a fob from his jacket, at which point it felt like he's turned on the sun, the blond temporality blinded as Henry got out of the car and began waving skyward, the rumbling making her very very worried, though hopefully his happy cry of "MOM" meant someone could explain. He vision was just beginning to clear up when he fell against her as he jumped back into the bug, which shook like it was caught in a hurricane stopping online with something that filled Emma with equal parts fear and arousal: the serious face of a very sexy giantess, who was currently holding the bug in her hand

"I presume this is a story which will need to be explained inside?" she asks rhetorically, turning on her heel and entering what Emma now sees is a giant mansion, bringing the car into the kitchen before setting it down, as Regina sits he blond gets a nice view of a canyon she could lose the bug in, never mind herself, Regina's breasts barely held in by her sleep shirt. "So, what did you do?"

"I found my birth mom, and she brought us back to Storybrooke" Henry chirps happily, while Regina internally grimaces, just because this was always going to happen doesn't mean she had to like it

"Interesting, and you are ..."

"Emma Swan Miss Mills, sorry but Henry didn't give a first name" Emma stumbles over her words in a panic as she exits the car, Regina smiles when she see's the blond looks nice in the red dress, very sexy

"Regina darling, now if only I knew why our son brought you all the way here" she sighs and was surprised by the answer

1) 'I wanted you to not be alone anymore' Regina was surprised by the answer, as was Emma, but the blond reminded Henry (in physical appearance as well as the fire in her eyes) of Regina's friend Malory, who would flirt, tease and kiss her neck playfully before her wives drag her away to help them with the twins. Regina's smile after those interactions are almost the same as the smiles she gives him, and he wants to see her smile like that more often.
2) 'You said how you'd kill for an actual helper my size, well here she is' Given Emma's lack of stable work Regina gets her to agree to be her assistant, finding some ways to amuse herself as well as use Emma's size to her advantage in the workplace
3) 'She's the saviour, and I want you to get a happy ending' Henry believes some of the book, there are too many similarities not to be true, but he doesn't think Regina is the Evil Queen, or at least not any more. Both Emma and Regina are unsure how to understand or process the answer, but they sure can try.

What a crazy situation anyway, Emma would never have expected to find out that her parents were the characters of some fairy tales, which meant that magic does exist, etc. It was too much for her at first to accept, but now she was happier than she ever was. 121311.content:
Henry frowns as he watches the pot bubble, he'd been feeling like the weak link in the chain recently, always being a target of whatever the villain of the week was because he was basically a normal human without magic or any kind of combat experience like his moms or grandparents (who are younger than both of his parents... his family tree was all kinds of messed up), and given he didn't have the time to learn to use a sword or bow at the level where he could be able to hold his own or help them, so he went for the next best thing: learning magic.

Now I'm sure you're wondering why he's doing this by himself and not with one of his magically powerful relatives, or even said relatives friends, who also have magic, well the thing is that both of his moms had made their thoughts on him learning magic quite clear, 13 is not a good time to be dabbling in sorcery (Emma's words, Regina was more eloquent and wordy) and while he knows his grandfather would be happy to teach him.... he wasn't as dumb as people think and knows Rumple wasn't exactly a trustworthy guy, plus he doesn't want to make things more difficult between him and the rest of Henry's family, both sides only tolerating each other for his sake. All that was left were the fairies, who besides Astrid creep him the Hell out, or some former villains like Ingrid and Maleficent, both who are good friends with one of his moms each and would tell them the moment he left after asking, if only to get permission to do so rather than actually trying to screw him over/ get him in trouble.

So instead Henry was going it alone, having appropriated several of his mom and grandfather's spell and potion books (he had a feeling Gold knows what he's doing, given the shelf looked to be unguarded by any means) and was trying his hand at something simple and hopefully non-destructive (hence why he isn't going for his mom's signature Fireball), a shrinking spell. He even had a target set up, for fun it was an apple he'd drawn a swan on, symbolising the goal of his attempt, to join the fight with his moms and keep the town safe. Once the pot stopped and had turned a pale blue, Henry dips the wand (he'd also borrowed it from Gold) in the solution and waves it at the apple.

Unfortunately Henry hasn't quite perfected the whole aiming thing, as the magical pulse misses the target, hits a mirror and blasts him right in the face, knocking him onto the ground as well as out. When he comes to Henry groans as he rubs the bruise on his head, his eyes still blurry for a couple of minutes, which when they cleared up he realised just how badly he'd screwed up. He was on the ground, with the wand about a foot away from him... and being several times his current size.

'Fuck!' Henry thinks, he'd messed up big time, and when his mom finds out he was going to be in so much trouble. Well all he has to do was figure out a way to deal with this for a little...

"Henry, are you there?"

Shit!

Henry gapes as the door opens and his best friend and secret crush Ivy Belfrey enters his room calling his name. He scrambles away as she just barely avoids stepping on him, then blushes deep red as he can see her panties under her skirt due to her standing right over him.

"Henry?" Ivy calls, the 15 year old frowns as she wonders where her friend had gone, she'd tested out the tracking charms and this was where it told her to go, did he step out to the bathroom? Did he get kidnapped again? This was weird.

"Ivy!" the brunette blinks, there was a squeak of something but she wasn't sure what it was "Look down, I'm right here" Henry shouts, standing and waving his arms in the hope she could here him, and luckily she did

"What the?" Ivy thinks aloud before gasping "Henry!" she shrieks, picking up her friend and pulling him into a hug, Henry's blush only deepening from getting crushed between the young mage's expanding bosom. Finally she releases her hold as she sits down on his bed, letting him sit in her hand "What happened to you, was it a villain attack?" she asks, looking annoyed someone would try hurt her best... okay he was her only friend but that meant there was no contest for him to be her best friend.

Henry shakes his head "No, this was me trying to learn magic, and it backfiring rather spectacularly" he sighs "I'm never going to get this right" he grumbles, then tenses when he feels Ivy rub his back with a finger

"Oh Hen, it'll work out, I've only just started to get my magic to work, Ana thinks it's so cool and Jas, well she just says I'm even more of a freak than before" she sighs and it's Henry's turn to be annoyed "Point is, maybe you're just too young to fully access your magic, or this is a sign that self study doesn't work when magic is involved, though I can't say I dislike the results as you are kind of adorable" she coos, then kisses him into her palm, giggling when she moves back

"I-I-I-I-I-Ivy" Henry stutters as he stands up again, his face now pink from her lip balm as well as his blush "Seriously?"

"Yep" she laughs "You are just too cute, I want to cuddle you or eat you right up" she grins at his expression then hugs him again "But don't worry Hen, Ivy's gonna keep you safe and sound" and despite how embarrassed her feels the boy actually does feel safe being pressed between her thin arms and soft chest.

What next?

1) Ivy decides to have some fun and keep Henry like this for a while, hen figure out how to fix this issue

2) She goes to her own magic teacher (Anyone who isn't Gold, Regina, Emma or the Blue fairy that is a powerful mage) in the hopes they can help them with Henry's little problem

3) This is a serious problem, so Ivy brings Henry straight to him moms, luckily they were both in the same place, so that they can fix her favourite person, hopefully avoiding a punishment that stops her from seeing him though.

13112.content:
It had been about a month since Emma and Regina had taken their little road trip out into the real world to go looking for Maleficent's stolen daughter (Emma still wasn't on speaking terms with her parents due to that), and overall most people were settling in to the new residents, except for one thing

Emma frowns, then places her hand on the brunette's shoulder "You're going to be fine, plus that was quite a powerful fire blast, so you have the power, just not the control and just ask Regina, I know how tha...."

"But you don't!" Lily practically shrieks as she turns to face Emma "You have magic you didn't want, didn't think you could ever control but all you had was magic, I have this THING in my head, clawing away wanting to be free" as she hisses that her eyes glow green and Emma tenses slightly, she'd been warned about this by Regina, and she knows if Henry or her parents knew she was doing this they'd have Archie check her for suicidal tendencies but she didn't care, Lily was her friend, hell she was the only person she'd loved besides Neal, with the exception of Henry, she wasn't going to let her suffer in silence like she did (not that the young dragon would, she would suffer loudly with swearing and heavy drinking)

"Okay, you're right that is very different to my situation but if you calm down we can discu...."

"I don't want to calm down!" Lily growls, her magic forming waves of heat and her hair to whip around in non-existent breezes "I just want someone to give me a straightforward answer that doesn't involve being a condescending cunt" as she finishes her speech blood red smoke wraps around her, parting only by the beat of large wings as Lily's dragon form was revealed to the blond.

While not as large as Maleficent Lily was still an intimidating beast, something Emma got up close and personal as the feral eyes locked onto her before tackling her, pinning her under it's large clawed forearm. The eyes, which from here were cat like continued to stare at her, her long snout puffs Emma's hair out of her eyes and those parted lips release a blast of hot air while she continues to press down

"Lily... please... stop" Emma wheezes, her voice breaks as she feels the pressure on her ribs. The dragon tilts it's head then red smoke wraps around them and Lily managed to pull herself back to human form. the problem, at least in Emma's eyes was that her body was still pinned by the human hand as well as the dragon claw had only just been there a moment ago, as well as how Lily's face took up her vision the same as the dragon's snout had done so.

Lily grinned and a purr rumbles in her throat, standing slowly as her fingers wrap around Emma's body, bringing her to her face

"Lily, please help. Change me back" Emma pleads, but the brunette just chuckles and nuzzles her against her cheek "MAte" Lily purrs, then licks her face "Mine"

"L-l-lily?" Emma squeaks, confused and worried about how her friend was acting

"Don't worry my dear" Lily coos, running her fingers all over Emma's shrunken form, pinching her tight rear and perky breasts "You won't be in danger any more, I'LL keep you safe"

Emma frowns "I'll be safe when I get grown back. If you can't grow me back bring me to Regina or even Maleficent"

Lily rolls her eyes "No pet, I'm going to keep my little mate safe exactly the size she is" she then brings Emma to her face and kisses her, her lips part so rub her tongue all over Emma's head "Delicious" Lily purrs, her eyes half lidded and smoky

Emma wriggles a hand free to wipe her face of saliva "Lily this isn't funny, let me fucking go and grow me back" Emma yells angrily, the dragon just frowns and sighs

"No" she states flatly, sliding Emma into her shirt pocket, trapping the blond in the tight fabric formed from her expanding bust since gaining access to her magic.

What now?

Lily grins widely as she sees her home (HER home, she's still getting used to that) which she shares with Maleficent, though given Lily's age and Mal's unsure nature as far as bonding is concerned, when not bonding as a dragon family they spend more time like housemates, the blond dragon knowing Lily will stay safe and always come home unless something happens for example.

131212.content:
"My family love me" Emma defends heatedly, the older blond had managed to needle a rather tender spot as of late, worry her parents (mostly Snow) were afraid of her now she had magic, especially with her limited control over said magic.

To her surprise the Snow Queen began to laugh "Oh Emma, it's almost sad that you believe that, you really think they'll accept you now you're a sorceress? We're taking about the White Family, who's kingdom basically banned all magic that wasn't used by the fairies, who all kissed Snow's ass because the Blue Fairy practically lived up there? No, they'll never understand, because they won't even try, they'll pretend, hope this magic thing is just a phase but it'll break one day. You and I are very alike Emma my dear, I'm just a few years ahead of the curve, they'll let their true thoughts out and when they do they'll show you they don't see the brilliant woman I do all they see is a monster"

"THAT ISN'T TRUE!" the sheriff yells as she slams the desk, lights exploding or sparking and a heatwave beginning to form in the room, the only thing protecting Ingrid was her own magical aura, which she had to lightly push to the forefront, knocking aside any of Emma's magic before it could affect her.

Now magic is a part of every mage, but it's also a little bit alive, because of that Emma's magic 'knew' there were problems, knew it wasn't working right and needed to do something about it in order to not destroy itself and Emma. A godsend was the abundance of much more stable and almost solid magical energy in the vicinity, which Emma's magic hungrily tried to absorb and assimilate. The problem came from a slight issue, Ingrid had a fully formed Ice Core, much stronger and stable than Elsa's stunted Ice Core or Emma's Fire Core, so when Emma's magic tried to use Ingrid's magic to pull itself together (The woman magic allowing it as Emma not blowing things up in the nearby area was good for both of them) the chill and mixmatch of elements, meant that Emma's core chilled and condenses, unexpectedly as her magical core shrank, so did she.

Emma's mind was a little preoccupied, which was why she didn't notice her diminishing size until she was looking at the edge of the desk she'd been previously leaning on, and when looking up saw Ingrid looking down at her with a mix of surprise and amusement as the girl continues to slip away until she was only a few inches tall.

1333323.content:
Regina grins as she watches Emma takes a bite out of the delicious slice. She had a good feeling that Emma had taken a bite out of the cursed piece.

"How is it?" Regina smiles.

"Very delicious." Emma smiles with a mouthful.

"Thank you, It's my own secret recipe." Regina grins.

Regina takes a bite out of her piece and starts to feel a bit strange, she looks down at her piece and her eyes widen, she had given herself the cursed piece. Regina tires to stand up and get away but her turned stomach keeps her in place. She doubles over the table and groans in pain as she feels the spell take effect. Regina looks up and sees Emma doing the same thing. Regina sighs as she knew she did something wrong, she must have spit the cursed piece in two so now her and Emma share the curse.

Before the two can react any more they feel their bodies dwindle down rapidly before stopping at five inches tall. Emma and Regina both look around and let their surroundings sink in, they have never felt so small in their lives. Luckily for the two their clothes had shrunk with them. Emma turns to Regina and shoots her a look.

"What the fuck did you do to me!" Emma shots.

"Bold of you to assume it was me." Regina scoffs and rolls her eyes.

"Well since you are the only one here with me its not much of a stretch." Emma snarks.

"Just relax." Regina sighs.

"Relax!?" Emma squeaks. "How can you tell me to relax when I am the size of a fucking barbie doll, don't tell me to relax."

"Yes relax." Regina groans. "You really think I would do this if there wasn't way to get back to normal, I did prepare something incase this happened to me."

"This where is it?" Emma asks.

"It's..." Regina's hands travel all over her body, in her pockets and all around. "Shit, it's still in my vault."

Emma sighs and folds her arms.

"We better get a move on then," Regina says.
